text: Poachelas is a genus of African araneomorph spiders in the family Trachelidae, first described by C. R. Haddad & R. Lyle in 2008. ==Species== it contains four species: *Poachelas montanus Haddad & Lyle, 2008 – South Africa *Poachelas refugus Haddad, 2010 – South Africa *Poachelas solitarius Haddad & Lyle, 2008 – Zimbabwe *Poachelas striatus Haddad & Lyle, 2008 (type) – South Africa ==References== Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Araneomorphae stubs Category:Trachelidae
title: Poachelas
